biocontainers.name: slang
biocontainers.summary: S-Lang allows developers to create robust multi-platform software

biotools.summary: SLANG (Simple Long-read loci Assembly of Nanopore data for Genotyping) is a Python script pipeline for locus assembly, orthology estimation and SNP extraction of Nanopore-sequenced multi-locus data.

bioschemas.name: SLANG
bioschemas.summary: SLANG (Simple Long-read loci Assembly of Nanopore data for Genotyping) is a Python script pipeline for locus assembly, orthology estimation and SNP extraction of Nanopore-sequenced multi-locus data.
